channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: This is a tiny little text box. My goal is to eradicate these beasts
item.source:markdown: This is a tiny little text box. My goal is to eradicate these beasts

item.title: Crazy Stupid Tech
item.description: Crazy Stupid Tech is a weekly newsletter about innovation and new technologies by longtime tech journalists Om Malik and Fred Vogelstein.
item.source:markdown: Crazy Stupid Tech is a weekly newsletter about innovation and new technologies by longtime tech journalists Om Malik and Fred Vogelstein.

item.description: Former county clerk Tina Peters sentenced to 9 years for voting-system breach
item.source:markdown: Former county clerk Tina Peters sentenced to 9 years for voting-system breach

item.description: New Yorker’s ‘Social Media Is Killing Kids’ Article Waits 71 Paragraphs To Admit Evidence Doesn’t Support The Premise.
item.source:markdown: New Yorker’s ‘Social Media Is Killing Kids’ Article Waits 71 Paragraphs To Admit Evidence Doesn’t Support The Premise.

item.description: If I ask good questions ChatGPT stretches my mind in ways it never has been stretched before.
item.source:markdown: If I ask good questions ChatGPT stretches my mind in ways it never has been stretched before.

item.description: Automattic demanded web host pay $32M annually for using WordPress trademark.
item.source:markdown: Automattic demanded web host pay $32M annually for using WordPress trademark.

item.description: And forget about paying the news orgs. They don't give you a way to opt out of the lies.
item.source:markdown: And forget about paying the news orgs. They don't give you a way to opt out of the lies.

item.description: scripting.com turns thirty in: 3 days, 51 minutes, 11 seconds.
item.source:markdown: scripting.com turns thirty in: 3 days, 51 minutes, 11 seconds.

item.description: I don't think you can claim to be part of the "social web" if you don't support links, btw. It's the most basic feature of the web.
item.source:markdown: I don't think you can claim to be part of the "social web" if you don't support links, btw. It's the most basic feature of the web.

item.description: Ian Kennedy put together a portal of NYC bloggers, sorted by borough, using FeedLand.
item.source:markdown: Ian Kennedy put together a portal of NYC bloggers, sorted by borough, using FeedLand.

item.description: So far we've only created reading portals. What I want for myself and for you, is a writing portal. Think about it.
item.source:markdown: So far we've only created reading portals. What I want for myself and for you, is a writing portal. Think about it.

item.description: 2004: Anatomy of an iPodder.
item.source:markdown: 2004: Anatomy of an iPodder.

item.description: “Part of being a Mets fan is the pain."
item.source:markdown: “Part of being a Mets fan is the pain."

item.description: John Roberts' Sordid Legacy: 14 Pages of Mean Tweets.
item.source:markdown: John Roberts' Sordid Legacy: 14 Pages of Mean Tweets.

item.description: I'm still waiting for the podcast client that can subscribe to OPML lists, so I can subscribe to shows from my desktop. If one of them did, we could start curated lists of feeds put together by smart people and influencers.
item.source:markdown: I'm still waiting for the podcast client that can subscribe to OPML lists, so I can subscribe to shows from my desktop. If one of them did, we could start curated lists of feeds put together by smart people and influencers.

item.description: The Making of Mork and Mindy.
item.source:markdown: The Making of Mork and Mindy.

item.description: Trump election interference trial: Jack Smith's big new Jan. 6 brief is a major indictment of the Supreme Court.
item.source:markdown: Trump election interference trial: Jack Smith's big new Jan. 6 brief is a major indictment of the Supreme Court.

item.description: Jack Smith Lays Out New Evidence in Trump’s Jan. 6 Case.
item.source:markdown: Jack Smith Lays Out New Evidence in Trump’s Jan. 6 Case.

item.source:markdown: MLB Gameday live updates: Mets at Brewers game on 10/02/2024.

item.description: How unhinged must Trump get to even matter?
item.source:markdown: How unhinged must Trump get to even matter?

item.description: Bank of America unavailable: Users report account issues on app.
item.source:markdown: Bank of America unavailable: Users report account issues on app.

item.description: Why bother with debates, for that matter why bother with the New York Times. What exactly is the purpose of these fake journalists.
item.source:markdown: Why bother with debates, for that matter why bother with the New York Times. What exactly is the purpose of these fake journalists.

item.description: scripting.com turns thirty in: 5 days, 42 minutes, 35 seconds.
item.source:markdown: scripting.com turns thirty in: 5 days, 42 minutes, 35 seconds.

item.description: You'll see this now every time you see El Orange speak.
item.source:markdown: You'll see this now every time you see El Orange speak.

item.description: Trade Secrets Radio: What is podcasting? This is the exact moment (9/24/2004) that podcasting got its name and its definition. We loved what RSS did for news, now we were doing the same thing for radio, not just talking but doing. If you were there, you remember this as well as I do.
item.source:markdown: Trade Secrets Radio: What is podcasting? This is the exact moment (9/24/2004) that podcasting got its name and its definition. We loved what RSS did for news, now we were doing the same thing for radio, not just talking but doing. If you were there, you remember this as well as I do.

item.description: The messy rules around cannabis use and organ transplants.
item.source:markdown: The messy rules around cannabis use and organ transplants.

item.description: Why should the New York Times hold Harris to a higher standard than Trump? Isn't that sort of our whole problem.
item.source:markdown: Why should the New York Times hold Harris to a higher standard than Trump? Isn't that sort of our whole problem.

item.description: The 1962 Mets No Longer Hold Season Loss Record.
item.source:markdown: The 1962 Mets No Longer Hold Season Loss Record.

item.description: I asked ChatGPT to explain positioning as covered by Ries and Trout books. I read their books in the 80s, made a big difference in my career.
item.source:markdown: I asked ChatGPT to explain positioning as covered by Ries and Trout books. I read their books in the 80s, made a big difference in my career.

item.description: My linkblog feed, the same items I crosspost to Mastodon, Bluesky, Threads, WordPress, Twitter. Works wherever RSS 2.0 is supported.
item.source:markdown: My linkblog feed, the same items I crosspost to Mastodon, Bluesky, Threads, WordPress, Twitter. Works wherever RSS 2.0 is supported.

item.description: Activitypub is too much. Cross-posting is exactly right and here now.
item.source:markdown: Activitypub is too much. Cross-posting is exactly right and here now.

item.description: Had a long phone talk with Doc today about crossposting and textcasting and other topics.
item.source:markdown: Had a long phone talk with Doc today about crossposting and textcasting and other topics.

item.description: I wish the various networks that broadcast Mets games would standardize on the scorebox position and layout. It’s another example of bigco’s who aren’t customer focused.
item.source:markdown: I wish the various networks that broadcast Mets games would standardize on the scorebox position and layout. It’s another example of bigco’s who aren’t customer focused.

item.description: Introducing User Magazine by Taylor Lorenz.
item.source:markdown: Introducing User Magazine by Taylor Lorenz.

item.description: Cross-posting is here now. I am not surprised Croissant is getting such a positive reception.
item.source:markdown: Cross-posting is here now. I am not surprised Croissant is getting such a positive reception.

item.description: I asked ChatGPT what is textcasting?
item.source:markdown: I asked ChatGPT what is textcasting?

item.description: The New York Times is putting Ezra Klein’s podcast archives behind a paywall.
item.source:markdown: The New York Times is putting Ezra Klein’s podcast archives behind a paywall.

item.description: If you let enough people congregate in the same space some issues will inevitably arise. Grifters are gonna grift, scammers will try to scam, hustlers will hustle, influencers are gonna try to influence, and business people will try to monetise everything.
item.source:markdown: If you let enough people congregate in the same space some issues will inevitably arise. Grifters are gonna grift, scammers will try to scam, hustlers will hustle, influencers are gonna try to influence, and business people will try to monetise everything.

item.description: I haven't tried this, but this is how we get around ActivityPub, with cross-posting. It doesn't matter what protocol you implement as long as you have a reasonable API. With some money they could and should at Twitter to this. Still reallllly popular. And Bluesky -- increase your character limit.
item.source:markdown: I haven't tried this, but this is how we get around ActivityPub, with cross-posting. It doesn't matter what protocol you implement as long as you have a reasonable API. With some money they could and should at Twitter to this. Still reallllly popular. And Bluesky -- increase your character limit.

item.description: Google adds a multi-functional quick insert key and new AI features to Chromebook Plus.
item.source:markdown: Google adds a multi-functional quick insert key and new AI features to Chromebook Plus.

item.description: CBS should just scroll the factcheck data through the bottom of the screen in real time. Don’t make people go to the website. This isn’t hard.
item.source:markdown: CBS should just scroll the factcheck data through the bottom of the screen in real time. Don’t make people go to the website. This isn’t hard.

item.source:markdown: Kris Kristofferson, Revered Songwriter Transcended Genre, Dead at 88.

item.description: This is probably the first piece Doc Searls wrote about podcasting, exactly twenty years ago yesterday.
